mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MPS_user ( username_m, realName_m, password_x, sex_x, age_n, email_x, phone_x, company_id, amount_n, authority_x, active_c, crtBy_m, crtOn_dt ) VALUES ( #{usernameM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realNameM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwordX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sexX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ageN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emailX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amountN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authorityX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activeC,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{crtByM,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{crtOnDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: SELECT (@rownum:=@rownum+1) AS serialNumber, u.user_id AS userId, u.username_m AS usernameM, u.realName_m AS realNameM, u.password_x AS passwordX, u.sex_x AS sexX, u.age_n AS ageN, u.email_x AS emailX, u.phone_x AS phoneX, com.name_x AS companyName, u.amount_n AS amountN, u.authority_x AS authorityX, u.active_c AS activeC, u.crtBy_m AS crtByM, u.crtOn_dt AS crtOnDt, u.updBy_m AS updByM, u.updOn_dt AS updOnDt FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) a, MPS_user u LEFT JOIN MPS_company com ON u.company_id = com.company_id WHERE u.active_c = 'A' AND com.active_c = 'A'
mapper.update: UPDATE MPS_user SET active_c = 'I' WHERE company_id = #{companyId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT password_x FROM MPS_user WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE MPS_user SET password_x = #{passwordX,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
